text: "It's All About the Pentiums" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "It's All about the Benjamins (Rock Remix)" by Sean "Puff Daddy" Combs . It is about a man who is obsessed with computers. Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:Parodies Category:1999 songs
title: It's All About the Pentiums
